issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
My titanium studio has been working perfectly these past few weeks. I open up titanium today and attempt to run my app again and the iOs Simulator refuses to launch. I get this error:
[INFO] :   Alloy compiled in 4.73981s
[INFO] :   Alloy compiler completed successfully
[INFO] :   Initiating Xcode pre-compile phase
[INFO] :   Processing JavaScript files
[INFO] :   Compiling localization files
[INFO] :   Checking for Splash Screen localization
[INFO] :   Skipping xcodebuild
[INFO] :   Finished building the application in 11s 65ms
[INFO] :   Running application in iOS Simulator
[INFO] :   Launching application in iOS Simulator
[INFO] :   Focusing the iOS Simulator
[INFO] :   Application has exited from iOS Simulator
[INFO] :   Project built successfully in 12s 517ms
[ERROR] :  Failed to focus the iPhone Simulator window
[ERROR] :  /Users/dawkir/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/3.2.3.GA/iphone/iphone_sim_activate.scpt: execution error: iPhone Simulator got an error: AppleEvent timed out. (-1712)

comments.body:
Hello,

please close all your apps, then try it again. This looks like your mac was slow to show the simulator, and thus showed this issue. 

Please let me know if this helps. 

Best Regards,

Hey Mauro, 
Thank you for your expedient response. I completely shut down and restarted my Mac, closing all of the open apps on the Mac as well as ensuring that they didn't reopen on launch.

Hello,

does it work now? 

Best Regards
After restarting the machine, everything worked fine.
